title: Ever Wondered Why We Toss & Turn During Sleep?
text:
IN Lifestyle ON 06 Feb, 2017 Ever Wondered Why We Toss & Turn During Sleep? Share on twitter Follow Us On 
Have you ever wondered why you woke up at the other end of the bed when you slept at another side? There are many of us who are violent sleepers. No, we don't mean that you go out on the march of killing people but your bed undergoes a lot of trouble when you decide to toss and turn. Often, we take this habit for granted. 
However, there is a scientific explanation behind the same and it also has some effect on our health. Wanna know? Ever Wondered Why We Toss & Turn During Sleep? 754 396 
During our sleep, even the deep ones, we tend to wake up in the middle of the night. However, the time taken for the action is so brief that we often fall back to sleep without remembering the movements consciously. What does science say? via 
While we are asleep, our body sends out EEG signals that momentarily wake us up and fuels the activities of the movements. It is soon before we are back to sleep. It lasts for few seconds and thus we do not remember it. However, if the arousal is for more than a few seconds then that is another story. When we toss & turn too much? via 
These are the normal behavior of the body during sleep. However, when the frequency increases, then that is not a good news. When our arousals last longer than a few seconds, we tend to remember them. That certainly breaks our peaceful sleep cycle. What are the effects? 
There are actually five conditions that are associated with this restless tossing and turning that causes discomfort in our sleep. Teething 
It can increase crankiness in people while causing swollen gums. Due to this disorder, people can often bite on the nearby objects on the bed. Sleep apnea 
This is a serious disorder where people stop breathing and then restart for multiple times during night. Reaction to stress
